org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api

Class PackageBasedPatternGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.impl.BasePatternGroup
      • org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.api.PackageBasedPatternGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPatternGroup

    public class PackageBasedPatternGroup
extends BasePatternGroup
    Package based BasePatternGroup implementation. It handles patterns as a group within the same package.
    Author:
    Abel Hegedus, Mark Czotter
